root.name: Mixed-Up Fairy Tales
root.description: Story Fairy tale characters are being stolen from their stories by a horrible fellow named Bookend, and only a reader can help out! The dragon Bookwyrm decides to intervene by recruiting the help of a child from a library to figure out which stories certain characters are on, and to help recreate the stories at various intervals during their original storyline. The main character gets marginally involved in fairy tale events, but for the most part simply decides to observe after realising imparting advice does not make a great difference to stories already written. Fairytales The following five fairy tales feature in Mixed-Up Fairy Tales: Snow WhiteSleeping BeautyJack and the BeanstalkCinderellaBremen Town Musicians
